name.title: Unique Identifier
name.description: Unique name or ID of this section.
name.comment: If used as a page section, ideally should be page path with slashes converted to dots, plus hash ('#'), plus unique CSS-compatible identifier (for HTML element ID), e.g. 'help.faq#how_do_i_setup_account'. If is a Search Info Header, should be URL-compatible so can request e.g. search-info-header.WorkflowRun --> '/static-section/search-info-header.WorkflowRun'.

section_type.title: Section Type
section_type.description: What this section is used for. Defaults to 'Page Section'.

options.title: Options
options.description: Options for section display. Currently only applicable for .CSVs

filetype.title: File Type
filetype.description: What type of file or content is contained. If not set, HTML or format of file (if any) is used.

startCell.title: (CSV) First Table Cell
startCell.description: For filetype:csv, from which [row integer, column integer] to start parsing table.

yaxisCols.title: (CSV) Columns for Y-Axis
yaxisCols.description: For filetype:csv, which columns (ints) should be used for Y-axis.

xaxisRows.title: (CSV) Rows for X-Axis
xaxisRows.description: For filetype:csv, which rows (ints) should be used for X-Axis.

titleCell.title: (CSV) Title Cell
titleCell.description: For filetype:csv, which table cell [row int, column int] to use to grab title of section/table.

skipRows.title: (CSV) Rows Skipped
skipRows.description: For filetype:csv, which table rows (ints) to skip in table (e.g. due to blank rows).

file.title: Source File Location
file.comment: There should be no 'body' if this is set.
file.description: Source file to use for populating content. Is superceded by contents of 'body', if one present.

body.title: Raw Body
body.comment: There should be no 'file' if this is set.
body.description: Plain html or text content of this section.
